sentence: Stacey Abrams' net worth over $3 million, compared to $109,000 when she first ran four years ago In the months preceding the 2018 election, Abrams, a Democrat, accused her Republican opponent in the governor's race, then-Secretary of State Brian Kemp, of using his position as Georgia's chief elections officer to promote voter suppression, an allegation Kemp has vehemently denied.
title: Stacey Abrams-backed election lawsuit heads to trial
